text: [Music]
[Applause]
[Music]
hello I'm Eis a technical customer
service specialist here at the AWS
office in Dublin Ireland today I'll show
you how to reset your AWS account rout
user multiactor authentication MFA
device let's get started to reset your
MFA device you must have access to the
AWS account throughout user email
address and phone number associated with
your account first sign in using your
AWS account root user email address now
enter the password of your root account
click cancel on the user saved Pass key
for aws.amazon.com floating
box on the additional verification
required page choose troubleshoot
MFA on the troubleshoot your
authentication device page choose sign
in using alternative
factors now validate that the email
address is correct and then choose send
verification
email you will receive an email from AWS
requesting to verify your account
through use your email address in the
email choose verify
email now confirm that the phone number
listed is correct and then choose call
me
now if you didn't receive the automated
telephone call or you need to update the
phone number see the knowledge Center
article Linked In the video description
answer the phone phone call from AWS and
use your phone's keypad to submit the
six-digit verification code that appears
on your device's
screen after typing the verification
code choose sign in to the
console after you choose that action you
are automatically redirected to your
security credentials now next to the MFA
device that you want to reset choose
remove finally to add a new MFA device
choose assign MFA
if you need additional assistance visit
the MFA support page by clicking on
contact us in the top of the AWS main
page on the subscriber Support Services
select AWS signin resources and then
help if you have a multiactor
authentication
issue when you're in the page choose the
button I'm still having problems and
would like to contact AWS support after
you choose the button you you see
several new options now you can complete
the request assistant will loster
unusable MFA device form and choose
submit so now you know how to reset your
AWS account through to use your MFA
device thanks for watching and happy
cloud computing from all of us here at
AWS
[Music]
